introduction.title: Introduction and workshop
introduction.description: 4 to 5 hours of activities. We will introduce the Sourcery academy, tell you more about what we do as front-end developers, get to know each other and have a fun workshop challenging your critical thinking, problem solving, communication and team working skills.

subjects.title: You will learn:
list: Functional testing for web applications and API

interview.title: An interview
interview.description: Only the top candidates after the final exam are invited to a job interview which will challenge your technical skills and English knowledge.
